message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to make a deal, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns. I'm willing to come down a bit to $11,500. This still allows me to get a reasonable price, and it's closer to your offer. Let's try to make this work!
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,250. Can you consider that?
